extendedInfo.description: ClevelandBarScene.com is an online local network for Cleveland, OH night-life and entertainment.  The Cleveland Bar Scene app lets users find the top bars in Cleveland, view web cams for each bar, chat with other Cleveland Bar Scene users, and keep updated with big events at the bars.Please let us know about any issues with performance, the interface, bugs, etc.[Tab app icons by http://glyphish.com/]

reviews.title: Excellent app!
reviews.comment: Perfect app to have on the go to check out some of Cleveland\'s most popular bars!
reviews.author: A Google User
